Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: Accounts Payable Specialist Salaries in the United States for Amazon.com | Indeed.com
s: Amazon.com Accounts Payable Specialist in the United States makes about $21.80 per hour. What do you think? Indeed.com estimated this salary based on data from 2 employees, users and past and present job ads. Tons of great salary information on Indeed.com
